name: Porcellina
description: The Porcellina is a tiny, agile beast with notable resilience in combat. It features a sharp, dexterous build that aids in cooperation with allies.
memorable: Unique ability to poison foes through contact and the capability of instilling fear with its frightful scream.
goals: Typically seeks to ambush prey or defend itself and its pack.
relations: Often found working alongside other small creatures or beasts that rely on group tactics.
environment: Commonly inhabits dense forests and areas with ample cover to support ambush strategies.
strengths: Excellent dexterity and pack tactics allow for coordinated attacks.
weaknesses: Low strength and intelligence render it ineffective in direct melee or complex problem-solving.
attacks: Utilizes a Bite attack that deals piercing damage and can knock targets prone.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to create fear in enemies with its Squeal reaction can disrupt combat.
senses: Possesses keen hearing and smell, granting it advantage on perception checks related to these senses.
skills: Has a strong saving throw bonus in Dexterity, enhancing its resilience against effects requiring such saves.
additional_information: Has Pack Tactics for enhanced attack coordination.
Poisonous Flesh can impose poison status on attackers.
Features a high movement speed for quick escapes or ambushes.
test_queries: cunning creature that can knock enemies prone
agile monster that uses pack tactics
scream of the Porcellina causes fear
quick walking creature with keen senses
